lead.en: a Research Geologist in Aramco Global Research Centers - Houston.
lead.cn: 现在在沙特阿美国家石油公司驻休斯敦研发中心任地质研究员。

about.en: I conduct research on hydrology coupled with geochemistry, specifically in the application of CO2 geological storage and carbonate diagenesis. As a PhD student in the Earth and Planetary Science Department at UC Berkeley and the Center for Nanoscale Control of Geological CO2, I conducted research on CO2 mineralization in volcanogeni sandstone reservoirs. As a research geologist in Aramco, I develop algorithms to model carbonate diagenesis and porosity evolution.
